title: FilesToGranulesConfig
description: Describes the config used by the files-to-granules task

inputGranules.description: granules object used to construct output for cumulus indexer

bucket.description: Bucket in-process file is being staged in in S3

granuleIdExtraction.description: The regex needed for extracting granuleId from filenames

matchFilesWithProducerGranuleId.description: When set to true, use the 'producerGranuleId' instead default behavior of using 'granuleId' when mapping files to granules. Defaults to 'false'
